name: ghostwire
description: ghostwire is an a no-code AI agent creation project, allowing users to spin up unique, personalized agents within minutes - and launch them within seconds. Users can assign a personality to an agent - as well as a main directive - and share their creations with the community. ghostwire features a number of 'anomalous' agents, overwriting, interfacing and changing their own environment and the platform itself, when appropriate.
